column4: Hey guys, I have this problem with my ntfs partition which I can't mount after doing a fresh install for ubuntu 11.04 and fedora cre 15, I did't touch the partition but when I try to mount from terminal it says it's an error of invalid arguments , Please help I need to recover my files
are you confident that you have not altered the partitions and their size during your re-install?
I would give http://www.supergrubdisk.org/rescatux/ a shot
